label: Suspect · 1939 – 1963
title: Lee Harvey Oswald
body: Described as physically identical to the hitchhiker picked up by Yates on Nov 20, 1963. Former U.S. Marine, defector to the Soviet Union, and primary suspect in the assassination.

label: Main Witness · 1928 – 1975
title: Yates, Ralph Leon
body: Refrigeration mechanic who reported picking up a hitchhiker on Nov 20, 1963 matching Oswald's description. Reported the incident to the FBI before the assassination. Later committed to a psychiatric facility.
